tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_failure (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    failure_type VARCHAR(50),
    failed_at TIMESTAMP,
    reported_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data ( 
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id INT, 
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50), 
    sensor_value FLOAT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE device_info ( 
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_name VARCHAR(50), 
    location VARCHAR(100), 
    model_number VARCHAR(20) 
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_failures ( 
    failure_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id INT, 
    failure_type VARCHAR(50), 
    failure_description TEXT, 
    failure_timestamp TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    manufacturer TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_status (
    status_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID,
    status TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE failure_predictions (
    prediction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id UUID,
    prediction TEXT,
    confidence FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    sensor_value FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    warranty_expiry_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id VARCHAR(50) REFERENCES devices(device_id),
    installation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_schedule_interval INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE failures (
    failure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id),
    failure_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    failure_description TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id),
    maintenance_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_description TEXT NOT NULL
)
